body: This silk +1 shadow padded armor is as dark as night and stitched with thread the color of dried blood. When worn by a rogue with the bleed talent, it increases the bleed damage of the rogue's sneak attacks by +1.
name: Murderer's Blackcloth
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Magic Arms and Armor/Specific Magic Armor and Shields/Specific Magic Armor/Murderers Blackcloth
